message: Hi, I’m really frustrated. I was promised a full refund for my canceled trip, and now I’ve been told I’m only getting a partial refund. This is unacceptable.

Hi, welcome to VoyageQuest. My name is Emma, and I’m really sorry to hear about your frustration. Let me quickly run through security so I can assist you right away. Could you please confirm your full name, date of birth, and booking reference number?
It’s David Matthews, DOB 14th January 1985, and the reference is VQ98765. But I’m still very unhappy about this.

Thank you for confirming, David. Security is now complete. I completely understand how frustrating it can be when things don’t go as expected. Let me take a closer look at your booking and see what I can find regarding the refund.
I don’t know why this is taking so long. I was promised something, and now I’m being told something else.

I completely understand your frustration, David, and I’m here to support you. Based on our policy, refunds for cancellations made within 7 days of the departure date are only eligible for 50% reimbursement. I can see this was explained in your original booking confirmation email.
That’s ridiculous. No one told me that when I booked. I wouldn’t have canceled if I’d known.

I completely understand how disappointing this is, David. While I can’t change the policy, I’d like to suggest an alternative—if you’re open to it, we can offer you a travel credit for the remaining 50% to use on any future booking with us.
I don’t want credit. I want my money back. This whole experience has been awful.

I’m really sorry that this has caused you such frustration, David. I completely understand where you’re coming from. While I wish I could do more, unfortunately, the refund policy cannot be overridden. Is there anything else I can do to assist you today?
No, you’ve already done enough. I’m definitely not booking with you again.

I’m very sorry to hear that, David. If you change your mind or need further support, don’t hesitate to reach out to us. Thank you for your time today, and I truly wish you all the best moving forward.
